sources.title: Ubalda, All Naked And Warm
sources.description: Set in the middle ages with knights on donkeys, chastity belts, unfaithful wives, and all the rest. Edwige Fenech is the star here but Karin Schubert makes an appearance as well.Â  Carla Mancini has a bit part, just one of her 241 actress credits from IMDb. Ran this one through Handbrake to add a little sharpness and some almost correctly timed optional English subtitles
